Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great price, excellent print quality, slow
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, print quality
Cons: Speed, size
Print quality is outstanding! Setup was a little confusing but once completed everything worked great. Good support for linux, a real plus in my opinion. Print speed is ok for home use, but there are a lot of faster printers. It is BIG! Takes up a lot of space on my computer desk. Overall a great value.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Reliable; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up
I have had this a little over a month and found it at the sale price. It's been a nice printer and I was looking for one that was reasonably priced, had the all-in-one features, and had the separate color ink cartridges. I had a problem with my old Dell printer and the single cartridge for all the colors. Time will tell if this one lasts. The only thing I find so far is that it takes a little while to be ready to print from when you first turn it on, but it's not a problem.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use, low price, and good quality
Cons: Nothing
This Canon printer multi-function is a great buy. I print photos, documents and use the scanner and fax machine. All are easy to set up and use. This printer prints faster and is quieter than the cheaper Canon printers. I would recommend this printer as the best multi-function for the price. I also think the sleek design makes it look good in any office or home.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
I LIKE THE CANON PRODUCTS, HOWEVER I HAD A DIFFICULT TIME SETTING UP THE PRINTER NEEDED TO CONTACT TECH SUPPORT. SETTING UP THE FAX OPERATION WAS DIFFICULT AND STILL NOT SURE IF I HAVE SET UP THE RECEIVE MODE FOR THE FAX. I REALLY LIKED MY MX700.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to setup. Easy to use. Wired or WiFi makes use simple. Not to mention the great photo printer, copier, scanner, and fax capabilities.
Cons: bulky, large.
Great price at NEWEGG!!!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
Using it for printing pics and for printing documents. It's fast ! I have not used the fax or the scanner yet. But it is a canon... Very reliable!! Love the look!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: printer was defective out of the box
Item.Review:
Cons: Difficult To Set Up; Unreliable
After working all day to make setup to no avail... Called my tech to come and try.He was partically successful... When I later tried to send a fax met a road block... Called Canon Support in Va. After two phone calls it was determined the unit was defective. I can either return it to them for exchange or try to take it back to Staples.. Will return to Staples tomorrow ?It cost me $85.oo to have my tech work on this defective unit..Will take a look at an Epson all in one as areplacement unit. The Canon was highly rated by PC World ? ugh

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice printer but be careful when installing
Item.Review:
Pros: Prints quickly
Cons: Needs a CD to install on your computer and messed up our wireless router
The printer works great. Haven't used it to scan anything yet. The only problem is when you set it up. My husband said that printers today shouldn't need you to install a CD on your own computer to use it. We had to set it up twice because the first time it changed our wireless router configuration and we needed a security code to install on our laptops. Had to go thru the setup again to figure out how to bypass the security feature of the router. Very big pain.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: cost, features
Decided to trade up from and older all-in-one and found this model on sale. It has everything I wanted and then some. Speed and quality are great. Easy to use. Easy to set up. A great product.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer with a great price!
Item.Review: I was disappointed when my Cannon PIXMA MP 780 stopped working but the PIXMA MX 892 has been a fantastic replacement! This model doesn't have an answer machine mode, but otherwise it prints clear and crisp documents.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of setup, wireless printing.
Cons: When starting up or printing 1st page seems to take a bit of time to warm up.
Other than the fact that it seems to take a bit of time to warm up this printer functions great. Only function I haven't used is the fax because I've been too lazy to run a phone line to the printers. Other than that everything else is functioning like a champ! Got it on sale plus with reward zone bonus bucks, it was obtained at a price that couldn't be beat. Haven't been using it too much yet so can't comment on the ink consumption.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Hard To Use
Smallest Ink Cartridges we've had yet. We use fast for a lot out simple print outs, and they are so light you can barely read them, yet it uses as much ink as our previous Canon printer. Not a good value.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: User interface and display, print quality, wireless, low cost.
Cons: Scanning using printer buttons requires user to end scan job at the printer.
This printer replaces a Canon MP830 that died suddenly after 6 years. The MP830 was good but the MX892 improved many of the features on the old printer. The user interface and MX Navigator software is greatly improved. The ability to print from anywhere on the home network is great. Print quality and ink usage is as good or better than the old printer. Finally, this printer is 6 year newer technology but is priced at only 50% of the old printer price.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Sharp prints, easy set-up, great wireless distance
Cons: Heavy and cumbersome, still not as fast as a laser printer
I purchased this printer for use at college, knowing that I had ample space to fit it. This thing is a behemoth of an inkjet printer. It weighs quite a lot, and the handles on the sides of the printer are kinda awkward. Nonetheless, the printer is incredibly accurate, and prints relatively fast for a wireless connection. The wireless distance is awesome since it runs through a router. If your router is up to pace, you'll be able to print from the maximum distance of the router itself. The printer cartridges are individual, so if you only use a certain color, you only have to replace that color. Photo quality is far better than the former HP printers I've o ... wned, and a few of my neighbors' HP All-in-ones. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Out of the box. Took off all the packing tape etc. Followed the setup instructions. Easy hand shake to the internet modem. Follow the printed instructions put the install disc in and maybe 20 minutes later was up and running. Everything worked great. You will need a printer cable for setup even if you want to go wireless.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to setup, and start printing.
Cons: Ink usage is high.
It was easy to setup, connected to wifi very fast. The only issue I find with it, is that it comsumes ink a little faster than other MX printer I have. Printing quality is very good.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good low end, low cost printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to use and set up
Cons: Scanning multiple pages is cumbersome
It's a solid printer for the price. I haven't used any features outside of printing and scanning. The printing works well and it's relatively easy to use. The scanner works well, but it's cumbersome when you have many pages to scan (since you can only scan one page at a time).

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Easy to Install on Mac & PC
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up
Canon has come a long way in their wirelsss setup procedures. I've owned several Canon printers and was very pleased they have made many improvements. This was very easy to install on a Mac & a PC. I started using it immediately.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: It is great all-in-one printer for home and office
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast doc print speed, Good features and movement, wireless
Cons: There is no cons. Only just a little slow scan speed and expensive photo papers required?
The best function of this printer is wireless networking. Click photo and print button in your iphone. That's all what you need to print your photo in your iphone. It's very simple! Scan speed is a little slow but quality is good. Doc printing is normal speed and quality. Photo printing is fast and very good quality though, Canon photo paper is expensive.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Lots of potential features, if you can get them all to work.
Cons: The exact opposite of User Friendly, its User Hostile. Not easy to setup.
For starters, I owned a Canon PIXMA printer and after working more or less successfully for a number of years, decided it was time for an upgrade. I originally bought this new Canon printer because of all the connected features like Apple AirPrint and Google CloudPrint. While AirPlay worked out of the box, when I went to setup CloudPrint, I had to find instructions online. Found those, with the first step being to check the firmware. Here’s where the silliness that is Canon started. To check the firmware, you have to print out a cartridge alignment page and it’s printed at the bottom (instead of just putting it in the setup m ... enu on the built-in printer screen. Fine, did that, found out I needed to update my firmware. Ok, I’m a fairly technical person, I can handle that. Here’s where things got worse: I bought this printer as a WiFi network printer. So guess what? I did not buy a USB cable nor have any intention of ever connecting it to a computer directly. Canon also did no expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, good price, easy controls,
Cons: Once you send a document to it, it takes awhile to get the printout. And it's heavy.
I haven't used all the features yet; all I've done is print documents. I haven't tried scanning, or printing photos yet, so I can't comment on those features. I bought it because I originally had a Dell 515W that kept giving me 'printhead error' and I finally had had enough of that. Canon printers are rated very highly on Consumer Reports as well.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, Wireless works perfectly, looks great, Very quiet
Cons: Trouble re-inserting the paper tray
This is my first Canon, and I love it! The only issue I have had is sometimes it is tough to get the paper tray back in. Otherwise, everything works wonderfully! I purchased this printer after switching to Mac from PC. My old printer wasn't compatible at all. This one works great. It is super quiet. I have yet to have any issues with the wireless, which was a big issue with previous printers I have owned. However, I have yet to figure out how to make it print from my iPhone. It doesn't show up when I go to print something. I need to troubleshoot a little bit more, but it isn't a big deal. I haven't printed any photos, so I am not sure of the photo print quality fo ... r this printer. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice printer with lots of features
Item.Review:
Pros: print quality, ease of printing, features
Cons: a little slow on some photo settings
Love this printer. Needed a wireless so this one replaced an earlier Canon model. Very easy to set up and start using. Link to wireless so easy, and fast, no computer needed. Sturdy, and nice looking.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use
I have only had this printer for about a month. So far it has worked well for me, both printing documents and color pictures. Still too new to determine reliability and cost for print cartridges.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price is fair.
Cons: Ink cartridges don't last.
Seems to go through ink quickly and isn't compatible with older Canon cartridges. The quality of the print is fine and the features (scanning, etc) work well although slowly. If you want speed, don't get this model. Pay more to get speed.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Supposed to work with wireless - but does not work reliably and went to wired connection
Continually have to reboot the printer to allow print jobs to go through with wireless - or have to wait a long time for subsequent print jobs to start. The wireless transmitter is within 4 feet pf the printer and the signal is at its strongest with excellent strength to computer as well. Switched to wired connection and do not have to wait for print job to start. Subsequent print jobs start immediately with no delay - even if sent hours later or the next day. Default profiles by type of document do not work properly.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Wireless printing; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Takes Time To Warm Up
I've only used this sparingly so far, but it has worked well with decent photo quality. Plastics used don't seem hugely heavy duty, but are probably fine for light use. Got a good deal as I had a coupon plus staples rewards money.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Price
We bought this and I loved it, until I had to highlight stuff on my page. It smeared the ink and the paper was printed the night before so I know it was dry. It is going back.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy set up, Wifi, scanning abilities
Cons: odd-shaped documents can't be fed into scanner feeder
I got this all-in-one mainly because it was on sale and so very inexpensive for the type of scanner it has - you can scan multiple documents by just putting them in the sheet feeder as a stack and pressing a button, and coming back a few minutes later and they're all done. You can even do duplex scanning (IE have it scan both sides of each page in the sheet feeder).
My only issue is that you can't seem to feed documents that are smaller than the standard 8.5x11 size. Maybe you can by specifying the size beforehand, but that somewhat defeats the purpose. What would be optimal is to be able to put a stack of different-sized paper in and have it all scan, but alas, for ... those that are not standard, I have to use the flatbed, which is a longer process.
The software is pretty nice and lets you save to pdf, or image formats, but it also, for pdfs, lets you crop, rotate, and reorder pages, which can really help so that you don't have to do all of this before scanning (making sure order is correct).
Anyway, I've been using this to try to go paperless and so far I think I've probably gotten rid of at least 10 lbs of paper! Using this with Evernote and dropbox, I can get rid of 95% of my documents and be confident I can always retrieve them when I need. Having the actual physical documents is not necessary in almost all cases, so it's a great solution for those who don't want to be burdened by huge, overflowing cabinets! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to install to home network.
Very nice machine easy to work and install. Family loves it we use Window's and Mac on it . Makes the HP we have had not look very well.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great product for a great price
Item.Review: I always had a Canon printer, my last one was a bit clunky...a Pixma 750, but I loved it. So when it finally drew it's last breath I was determined to replace it with another Canon. True, the ink is pricey, but the quality of print is worth it. I usually print photos of my grandsons that my daughter e-mails to me and I want them to be of good quality, I am not disappointed! Also, this Pixma seems to be a bit quieter than the last. All in all, I am very pleased with my new Canon!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, networkable, separate ink tanks, great quality printing and scanning
Cons: Ink usage, large unit
We bought this printer for home use because we have multiple PCs and needed a network printer. We also were looking for one that had the multiple ink cartridges so we didn't waste ink like we did using our old tri-color single color cartridge printer. This unit met those aspects and more. The Canon quality of printing is still the same, the scanning is also Canon quality (we have on older flatbed Canon scanner to compare) and the single button copy feature is great. We have not used the fax yet. It was easy to get on the network and works with all three of our PCs (both Windows XP and Windows 7 operating systems). The software suite that came with th ... e unit has many features that make it easy to use. On the cons: it does eat ink quickly as the individual ink tanks are small (but easy to replace); it is not straightforward as to how to get the printer to use the large blank ink tank for economy or standard printing of black and white docuements without wasting the color ink; it is a large unit - definitely be sure to measure for space requirements before purchasing and take into account opening the lid for scanning and copying. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Too large. Hard to figure out how to manually feed, e.g. labels. No clear option on how to economize on ink usage.
Improve the user interface, e.g. a clearly identified print option that just says "economy" to print light and save ink. Still haven't figured out how to manually load label form.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer and options for the price
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of setup and use
Cons: Takes a bit of time to warm up and start printing the very first page
This is a great printer and has lots of extras that normally increase price significantly. The automatic document feeder and duplexer are great to have; I didn't realize how nice it was until this printer. Absolutely nothing to do to get Airprint to work and now the family is able to print from their iPhones and iPads.
I like the ability to scan from the printer directly to my laptop or to a hard drive.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Quality is much better than our other printer.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up for a home network with multiple computers.
Cons: Nothing so far.
Nice looking, much smaller than our previous model but contains all the great features of a quality all in one machine.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to read controls; Easy to Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Takes one at a time paper; Easy Wired or Wireless; Plain AC plug; Quality Construction
Five Inks are very nice, change only one at a time. NO other printer that I looked at, had as many features for the price ! I told all my computer friends...

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast, easy to set up and use
Bought this printer a few weeks ago, and NO complaints!! It runs like a champ, the wireless works great!! Definitely recommend!! It is on the big side, it is a large printer - so you will need some space for it, but it works great!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use
Cons: Difficult To Set Up
The software wouldn't load on the first computer, a desktop running Vista. I finally got it done but it took a long time to download the individual files from the website. Fortunately, the software loaded fine on two other computers, laptops, one with Vista, one with 7.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Cons: Unreliable; Flimsy Construction; Difficult To Set Up
Worked fine for about 6 months, then keypad quit working and I could not do anything. I can still do basic printing but it is Slow and I wasted my money on another Canon product.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Sharp Detail
Cons: Inefficient; Slow Print Time
Gotta love the airprint on this printer - that's the boss' favorite feature. That said, we bought it for the paper feed on the back for increased options over the bottom tray, but even selecting that tray in preferences doesn't work. Going back to check the options afterward (thinking I had made a mistake), my choice for the rear tray is still selected, the printer just won't draw from that tray unless I choose high resolution print, which sucks down ink like a vampire. Frustrating, and Canon doesn't seem to have a solution for it.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy setup and quality of printing
Cons: Nothing yet
I'm not usually high on Canon printers because they seem to drink ink. That has not been the case so far. It does a reasonable job with good print quality and speed. I especially like the way it prints on both sides of a sheet of paper with no involvement from me.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Would buy again, wish ink was cheaper
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy to Use
Cons: Expensive Ink
Love that I can copy at home, print amazing pics and send a fax if needed. Had another similar Cannon printer for 6 years before and loved it. Only grip is expensive ink.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: If it isn't broken, don't fix it
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use
I loved my Canon MX-700 so I bought the model that replaced it. I like that it can do two-sided printing without turning over the paper and that I don't have to plug in the laptop to print but they made it more difficult to set up and use (in certain circumstances). The paper tray is smaller, more difficult to load and you can't just see when it's empty. I had to call support to get the incoming fax working with my set up. The MX-700 set up without ANY problems. And they changed the scanner set-up to a method that's slightly more difficult to use with different "identities" on the same computer. And it takes longer to print that first copy. Perhaps I just expected it to work just like the MX-700 (wuth the addition of 2-sided copies and air-printing..and I'd advise ... them to make the next one work as easily as the MX-700..but I'd still recommend this one as having the ability to get all my work done. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Wonderful! Easy to set up & works great!
Item.Review:
Pros: Nice job printing, scanning/copying & used as a fax machine. Installed it in 10 minutes!
Cons: Nothing!
I returned a different brand all-in-one printer after 3 weeks. That went into energy save/sleep mode & forgot to wake up when I had an incoming fax. The Canon is superb!!! Love it!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: it works
Cons: nothing yet
Much better than the 830; more compact, higher resolution for photos and more features. Have only had it for a couple of weeks and not used it much.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: all in one and it prints photos well
Cons: ink goes fast and is somewhat expensive
Great printer. Have had Canon printers before and they last somewhat better than other brands I've used.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great wireless all in one printer
Item.Review:
Pros: Can change color tanks individually so no wasted ink.
This is my second all in one printer. It was easy for me to set up, and I was ready to print in a short time. I have the printer on the first level, and I can send to it from my third level. The color is great and the speed is fast. When you have to change the ink, each color has its own tank which is good because you don' t waste expensive ink.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Good printer, scanner, copier (havent tried to fax
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast, great print quality
Cons: Sometimes takes forever to start printing.
This printer is probably, by a small margin, the best printer I have ever owned. I really like the wireless feature. I think the upgrade to 802.11n does help the speed. Resolution is great. I constantly get compliments on the work it turns out. Even "quick and dirty" test prints look quite good. Once it gets started, the speed is very good. However, it is often the slowest printer I have ever owned at starting to print. I realize this is an inherent limitation of all inkjets, but this one is the worst I ever saw for that shortcoming. This is the only reason I won't rate it 5 stars The scanner is excellent, also, even though not as good as my old Epson flat bed. It is an extremely quiet s ... canner. That is always a plus.. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great printer but need less ink colors
Item.Review:
Pros: Quality Construction; Efficient; Easy to Use; Reliable
At this time i feel printers do not need all those color catridges to print.Should be black and color standard for needing ink when supply goes low on print quality.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Love the wifi and print quality
Cons: N/A
Really enjoy this printer. It seems to do everything and the print quality is outstanding. Solid build with everything saying it is made with quality. Ink cartridges seem small but last decently. I purchased an outside inkjet kit cheaply for replacement. Great printer. Love the Airprint also.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Had to replace an older and much more expensive all-in-one Canon MP830 with a broken print head. The 892 has more functionality (2-sided printing, wireless), a lower profile, and easier-to-use, on-unit buttons. The computer software controls also are faster and easier to use than with the 830. Only negative is the first print of the day takes almost 5 minutes as the machine goes through its set-up routines.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Awesome features, ink goes a little fast
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Easy to Use; Reliable
Cons: Large footprint
We bought this for my church, and after experiencing it for myself I decided to buy one for home. I love the digital filing - I can send a PDF of JPEG document to the desktop of any of my three computers, I can duplex scan and print, and the print quality os great. I have another duplexing Pixma - the 4200, and the ink lasts a LOT longer - I guess the cartridges on the MX series are smaller.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Low price and efficient; Efficient; Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up
Normally [$], but with Instant Savings saved $70.Checked at [@] and others and saw this model priced at [$]!

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice MFP for the price, chic look
Item.Review:
Pros: The printout cover that closes to keep dust from getting to the rollers automatically opens when it senses a print job.
Cons: The time you click print to the time the mfp acknowledges the print job and spits the first page is about 2-5 minutes.
Overall this machine is beautiful, the design, the way the engineers and designers really looked at ways to keep the parts lasting longer with the printout door is kept closed but only opens when it is being used(printing) but that could be an idea or a design fluke with no purpose intended, simply a design purpose.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: It is a wonderful printer for the price.
Item.Review:
Pros: It does everything all in one. Prints, copies, faxes, photos
Cons: ink runs out quicker then my old HP but this is a much better printer and the ink is cheaper for the Canon..
I have had two HP printers in the past 2 years both did not last. Everyone told me to get a Canon you can't go wrong. They were right. it is perfect.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: Having purchased alot of all in one printers, The Canon Series Seems to be pretty reliable. with very few hardware defects. The best part is the software. It is very well written. AAs an IT Pro, this is very important to me. I would rather set up a piece of equitment and forget about it.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: After a little over a month, my printer will no longer feed paper through from either source. I am returning it to Office Depot to exchange it for another one. Hopefully a different one will do a better job and be more dependable.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: The Pixmas MX892 has many fantastic features.
Cons: It takes alot of time to warm up the first time I use it everyday.
Up to now I have always used HP printers. This is the first time I am using a Canon printer, and in the short time I have been using it, I am very satisfied. I am looking forward to making use of the many features this printer has in the future.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Efficient; Quality Construction; Reliable; Easy to Use; Wonderfull; Easy To Set Up
I still have a pixma mp500 I have had for 6 years now and Ilove this printer but wanted a WIFI printer that is the only reason I bought a new one.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Cost, print quality speed
I'm very happy with this printer. Great print quality on all sorts of documents. Impressive print speed whether wireless or direct connect. Haven't had a single problem since installation.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Scans great, prints fast
Cons: No dislikes
I use this printer for my wife's business documents and for my general business printing. I've not used it yet for photos as I have 9500 Pixma Pro for photos. This printer scans documents quickly and cleanly, very simple process including multiple page documents. Printing is quick and quiet. I'm on my first round of cartridges, so I can't comment on ink usage.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.ReviewTitle: Great product - would recommend to all
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Reliable; Efficient; Easy To Set Up
Cons: Flimsy Construction
I originally received a photo printer for an I-phone for Father's Day, but since I don't own one I returned it and bought this printer which I am using to replace my old printer that just died on me. I have not had the opportunity to use it much yet, but so far I like it a lot and am very happy with it.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review: This is my first wireless printer replacing my MP830 which finally died. I inserted the CD to install the printer on my Dell and clicked GO. Did the same for my Imac, HP Laptop and Lenovo laptop. Not a single hickup and the printer functions flawlessly. Highly recommend this printer.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Reliable
Cons: The top part is too heavy
The top part is too heavy, so it is not easy to open the cover and scan,copy. They should put less stuff in the top cover.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to Use; Easy To Set Up; Efficient; Reliable; Quality Construction
Cons: Slow to warm up
This was on clearance for around $100 -- and it's printing well for our daily use.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Reliable; Fast duplex printing; Excellent color quality; Easy to Use; More features than I need; Quality Construction; Easy To Set Up; Efficient
Cons: Printer ink is expensive
The MX892 was purchased as a replacement for my MX860 which I had for 2 to 3 years. It was used heavily and finally the print head wore out. I was so happy with the MX860 that I didn't even consider anything but another Canon and the MX892 fit the bill. I have not been disappointed.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast,printing quality , very easy cartridge change
Cons: warming-up takes time longer
It is so nice and very high quality printer. If you have it you do not need another one.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: air print /wireless
Cons: five tanks?
Great all in one printer! Great LCD interface. Ability to print from my iPad, iPhone. The ability to send scanned documents to your computer (wirelessly). I have a PC and a MAC and it works great with both platforms.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Reliable; Easy to Use; Quality Construction; Efficient
I had an HP wireless printer that was no longer supported and decided to replace it with something else. The salesperson who helped me recommended the Canon and I was surprised at how easy it is to set up and use. I have not set up faxing yet but everything else has been working fine.

Item.Item: Canon PIXMA MX892 Color Ink-jet - Fax / copier / printer / scanner

simple setup, easy to use, print, scan, copy, fax. quiet
